No hirings that overlap. with immediate needs, but Behring Co. is a privately owned, vertically integrated real estate development and private equity platform located in the San Francisco Bay Area.  With over a 60-year family history of development and successful investment, Behring Co. has cultivated a specific expertise in high value, mixed-used residential projects with urban in-fill locations that benefit from permanent demand drivers such as mass transit. Behring Co. has over $2.6B in Development Experience, over $130M in Assets Under Management, and Investors and Partners in 26 Different Countries. We were founded in 2012 and have sponsored 6 investment funds.

Behring’s investment strategy is simple—continue to raise the bar and strive to be an industry leader in everything we do.  As a developer, we take a hands-on approach that maximizes value at every phase of real estate development:  underwriting acquisitions, smart design and pre-construction programming, engineering and construction, international sourcing and procurement, financing and operations, refinancing and exit. As a private equity firm, we identify domestic greenfield development opportunities that surpass our minimum benchmark or 15% IRRs.  Where possible, we will lever opportunities with EB-5 capital that lowers cost-of-capital and is a win-win solution for all involved.  As a venture lending fund, we combine loans with warranties or rights to purchase equity in start-up and growth companies to maximize success and compensate for risk.

No hiiring but financial controllers is a role. Fox Real Estate is a performance-based property and asset management firm dedicated to maximizing the value of multifamily real estate assets. With over a decade of grit and expertise, we’ve repositioned more than $1.45 billion in properties across retail, mixed-use, and multifamily sectors. Our mission is simple: deliver results that transform underperforming assets into high-performing investments.

What sets us apart is our hospitality-driven approach. We believe that creating a welcoming, community-focused environment not only enhances tenant satisfaction but also drives financial performance. Our track record speaks for itself. We’re currently repositioning over 900 units, achieving an average NOI increase of 87%. For example, at Ledger in Washington DC’s Union Market, we more than tripled the NOI of a 134-unit Class A asset through strategic repositioning and hospitality-infused management.

Our Services Include:

Property and asset management
Strategic repositioning and value-add execution
Hospitality-infused operational management
Financial analysis and performance optimization
Marketing and leasing strategies
Whether you prefer a collaborative approach or a fully managed solution, our flexible service models ensure we meet your specific needs. Ready to maximize your real estate investment? Connect with us to learn how our performance-based model can drive results for your portfolio. At Fox Real Estate, we only win when you win.

Only  hiring for sales reps but Whitebox Real Estate is here to service the real estate needs of rapidly-scaling, forward-thinking companies that cannot be met by a stagnate commercial real estate industry still running the same playbook it has for fifty years.  

We are here because this is the time for a new vision, a new type of commercial real estate agency and with this, a new type of agent.

Mission Statement:
To play a fundamental role in the success of the next great wave of companies and provide the type of expertise that makes us a trusted resource for achieving their short and long-term goals.

Who we are for:
Smart, forward thinking companies with a clear vision of their company goals and objectives.

Who we need:
Strategic partners and consultants who think differently and provide insight and advice, not a sales pitch on behalf of the landlord.

What we provide:
A commercial real estate strategy based on the unique challenges of rapidly scaling companies.

Five Ways We Do This:
1.  We don’t do “deals”. We negotiate smarter leases that provide maximum flexibility to allow a growing company to breathe.
2.  Staying connected to our clients after the lease is signed so we can continue to provide advice and insight as they evolve.
3.  Understanding commercial real estate’s unprecedented impact on recruiting in the “gig” economy.
4.  Hiring and training a new type of real estate professional to think differently about their role in helping our clients achieve their business objectives.
5.  By building long-term relationships with our clients by ALWAYS putting their needs ahead of our own, no matter what.

commercial manager Adler Partners is a vertically integrated real estate investment company that focuses on the acquisition and operations of multi-tenant light-industrial and related business parks in the Eastern and Southern United States. Adler Partners invests through Funds, Managed Accounts and individual asset Joint Ventures. The Company's Investment philosophy is to focus on capital preservation, cash flow and value creation. The origins of the business dates to the 1950’s when Samuel Adler founded the Adler Group in Miami, FL.

Adler Partners pursues a vertically integrated niche strategy highly focused on a specific market sector, enabling it to generate favorable risk adjusted returns for its investors. 

Adler Partners was formed in 2012 as the successor to the Adler Group’s investment business which had a successful 50 year track record developing and acquiring multi-tenant office and industrial assets. As of early 2020, the portfolio includes 23 properties in 11 cities across the United States.

The first golf-specific home training program to embrace the approach of home exercise equipment paired with streaming instruction, GolfForever takes it one step further by customizing each golfer’s exercise routines just for them, based on a proprietary strength and flexibility test users take when starting. The result is a product and program that is safe, highly effective for any golfer and proven to work, as evidenced by a pilot study that saw users who used GolfForever three days per week for 30 days gain an average of 26 yards with their driver.

Notes:
Needs staff. Rafiki Coalition for Health and Wellness is a health, wellness and fitness company based out of 601 Cesar Chavez, San Francisco, California, United States. 

Rafiki Coalition’s mission is to eliminate health inequities in San Francisco’s Black and marginalized communities through education, advocacy, and by providing holistic health and wellness services in a culturally affirming environment.

Rafiki Coalition strives to achieve its focus by providing health and wellness services including, but not limited to, health education, movement classes, health screenings, advocacy, transitional housing and case management services for people living with HIV/AIDS, trauma resiliency and mental health circles, and other health-promoting activities.

Director, National Gym Supply was built from the ground up in 1993 with Jon Webster at the helm. The goal – to reinvent the fitness equipment parts industry by helping customers extend the life of their fitness equipment. 30 years later, we’re the leading parts distributor in our industry and have 40+ team members who support national and international customers. How did we do it? We hired great team-oriented individuals with energy, ideas and gumption. 


We formed important partnerships with manufacturers and built an expansive inventory of more than 30,000 OEM and direct-sourced parts so we can ship faster and more efficiently. Technology is in our core.  We developed and continue to refine the industry’s most comprehensive set of online tools where you can research, identify what you need, view buying options and make intelligent purchases. And if you make a mistake, we charge no restocking fees.

We stock parts for all major fitness equipment manufacturers. With one-stop shopping, our 15,000 active customers save time and money by buying replacement parts for all brands of their fitness equipment on one website or by making one phone call. 


We trust our customers to be the experts in fitness equipment repair. But if you need help, use our “Find A Technician” feature to locate repair support in your area. With our “Exchange and Repair” service, our team of electronics repair experts repair  broken electronics.  Our customers can save up to 50% off the price of new electronic parts.

We also offer parts to keep your strength and selectorized equipment in peak condition such as snap links, weight pins, cable-making supplies and tools. Our online Custom-Cable app allows customers to build their own strength cable assemblies.

As our story evolves, our culture will continue to be centered around our key aim to constantly delight our customers with new and innovative ways to keep their fitness equipment running and in top shape. We’re just getting started!
